plot: A young girl, who by fate runs into an elderly man, and through their awkward relationship he shows her that family is the most important thing in life.
title: In Frame
plot_es: A young girl, who by fate runs into an elderly man, and through their awkward relationship he shows her that family is the most important thing in life.
plot_en: A young girl, who by fate runs into an elderly man, and through their awkward relationship he shows her that family is the most important thing in life.
